summary: 9 new spells that is just for fooling around.
descriptionHtml:
Well this mod gives you 9 new spells that is just for fooling around. You will get them at the beginning of the game. And they require no magicka or skills to cast. If you liked these spells and also tried my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75665?]Cheat Spells[/url] then just use my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75667?]Cheat And Fun Spells[/url] since it has all of these spells and the Cheat Spells as one mod. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1012/?]here[/url] And if you play Oblivion also look at my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/28897?]Oblivion Fun Spells[/url].

The spells are

Fun Fire
Fire Damage on Target that does alot of damage

Fun Frost
Frost Damage on Target that does alot of damage

Fun Shock
Shock Damage on Target that does alot of damage

Fun Health
Fortify and Restore Health on self for one day in the game

Fun Magicka
Fortify and Restore magica on self for one day in the game

Fun Stamina
Fortify and Restore Stamina on self for one day in the game

Fun Speed
Fortify Speed on self for one day in the game

Fun Jump
Fortify Jump points on self for one day in the game

Fortify Skills
Fortifies all skills and unlocks all perks on self for one day in the game.

Requirements
Skyrim
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin, and bsa into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
